post.text:
Wishing you a very, very Happy Fourth of July! There's a lot to celebrate and there will be more to celebrate come November when we take back America! #MakeAmericaGreatAgain

DONATE NOW: donaldjtrump.com/july-4th

comment.author: Anna
comment.text: Celebrating America! Land of the free, home of the brave! I am a legal immigrant and proud to be American! I am voting Trump this November to keep America safe & great!

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: Thank you Anna. Welcome to America.

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: Shelley Hinkle I thank you back! Anna from Florida.

replies.author: Cody
replies.text: No Anna, Mr. Trump doesn't want to keep America great, he thinks it's not so great and that is the platform he is running. He will make it great AGAIN because it's not a great country now.

replies.author: Lindsay
replies.text: Welcome aboard, Anna!!❤ #GodBlessAmerica And our future #PRESIDENTTRUMP !!❤ #Hillary4Prison
